      • mergeImages

        public java.awt.Image mergeImages(java.lang.String toAddOnTop,
                                  boolean addToWall)
        Merge two images together.
        Parameters:
        toAddOnTop - = image to put on the top.
        addToWall - = boolean. True is a wall and false is free.
        Returns:
        Image.

      • mergeImages

        public java.awt.Image mergeImages(java.lang.String toAddOnTop,
                                  int addToWall,
                                  java.awt.Color tintColor,
                                  boolean grayScale)
        Merge two images together with a colour tint.
        Parameters:
        toAddOnTop - = image to put on the top.
        addToWall - = boolean. True is a wall and false is free.
        tintColor - = colour tint to add.
        grayScale - = creates the greyscale affect for pausing the game
        Returns:
        Image.

        Parameters:
        image - = to be gray scaled

      • rotateImage

        public java.awt.Image rotateImage(java.lang.String toRotate,
                                  int totalRorations,
                                  int bufferZone,
                                  boolean greyScale)
        Rotate images by 90
        Parameters:
        toRotate - = image to rotate
        totalRorations - = how many times the image will be rotated by 90degrees
        bufferZone - = colour tint to add.
        greyScale - = if image needs to be gray scaled
        Returns:
        Image.
